data.name: Mule 2
data.author: Bredroll
data.description:
Take advantage of the Mule tactical hover craft. High speed insertion of special forces and resupply
At sea the Mule is capable of 25-30 m/s, on land approx 15 m/s.
When used with Revolution 1.4, The Mule allows fitting of a 30mm or 40mm turret and optionally virus bots and smoke launchers
